content:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:  
  name: ${pod_name}
spec:
  tolerations:
  - key: "node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane"
    operator: "Exists"
    effect: "NoSchedule"   
  containers:      
  - name: ${pod_name}        
    image: stonebranch/universal-agent:${ua_version}
    env:
    - name: UAGENABLESSL
      value: 'yes'
    - name: UAGNETNAME
      value: '${pod_name}'
    - name: UAGOMSSERVERS
      value: '7878@${uc_server}'
    - name: UAGTRANSIENT
      value: 'yes'
    - name: UAGAGENTCLUSTERS
      value: '${uc_cluster}'
    ports:
    - containerPort: 7887
description: Template for Kubernetes POD running Universal Agent
